# Tender Announcement: Pure Storage FlashArray
Government of Canada | Shared Services Canada

### Public Tender Notice

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is issuing a tender for **[Pure Storage FlashArray]** as part of its efforts to modernize its storage infrastructure. The competitively bid project aims to provide a high-performance, scalable, and reliable storage solution.

### Key Tender Details

#### Notice Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Tender Status
Expired

#### Closing Date
Tender closed on October 17, 2022 at 2:00 PM (EST)

#### Product/Service Details

* **Classification**: ADP Support Equipment (G-SIN: N7035)
* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region**:
	+ Canada 
	+ Ontario (except National Capital Region)

#### Tender Documents

<https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/D5055B43-5CA8-419C-8FDB-FD7C002D4C2C>
<https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/CD0687EC-0DB0-47B8-A0E6-813867A730D4>

For further information regarding this tender or to download the tender documents, please contract the contact below:

### Contact Information

Ms. Christiane Joanisse
Senior Contracting Officer

90 Metcalfe Street
Ottawa, Ontario K1P 6K2
Email: [christiane.joanisse@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:christiane.joanisse@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
Phone: 343 549-9457
Fax: (613) 960-6007

Please note that the above notice is an archived item and the closing date for tender has expired. Any questions or inquiries regarding the tender should be directed to the contact above.
